You're one step closer to your dream remote job. Welcome!
As the world's largest recruiter of premium full-time remote jobs, Crossover uses a skills-based hiring system with simple self-paced assessments.

We help the best people in the world qualify for the best jobs in the worldâ€”and earn a lot more in USD than most local jobs.

To get this job, you'll need to prove that your skills are in the top 1% of your field. Have you got what it takes?

What to expect next:

  1. After submitting your application here on Indeed, you will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
  2. You'll have 14 days to complete a series of online screening assessments. The first tests will take under an hour, and make sure you're a basic fit for the role (with sufficient work experience, cognitive aptitude, and language skills).
  3. If you ace those, you'll be invited to prove your job skills and complete assessments modeled on real work. The top applicants will be interviewed by the hiring manager (and 80% of interviews result in a job offer).

If you don't receive the email within 15 mins, check spam, or reset your password here.

question: Are you ready to prove your skills are world-class?
